alert.note: Alert for Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southwest Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 21 at 2:36PM MDT until March 22 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, and Southwest Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 7 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southwest Mountains
